content: Hey babe, good morning! How's the hotel? Did you manage any solid rest?
Morning. The bed's okay, but the AC made weird noises. I got enough sleep to function though.
Conference hotels often have their quirks. How are you feeling about your big presentation? Nervous? 😬
A bit anxious. Just doing a final run-through of my slides. I'll survive!
Hello both! Before I forget, want a quick news brief? Some interesting headlines today. 📰
Sure, let's hear it. Anything major happening?

From what I gathered: there's a tech summit unveiling a new smartphone, a few stock market shifts in energy, and a big sports final tonight. Also, rumor says a celebrity couple split, but that's unconfirmed.
Sounds like a busy day in the world. I'm mostly curious about that new smartphone. Might check it out later.
Kids were up early. They were asking about you. Seems they miss having you around.
I miss them too. Let them know I'll do a video call tonight if possible. Maybe around 7 PM?
Sure. That works. They have after-school soccer, but they'll be home by then.
Scheduling a 7 PM call for you. 🕖
Good. So what's on your agenda today besides the presentation?
We have networking sessions in the morning. Then the main talk at 2 PM. I'll be swamped until at least 5.
Got it. The plumber is still supposed to come by between 2 and 3 PM here. Fun times. 😅
I'll keep track of that plumbing appointment. I can send you an alert when he's on his way, if you'd like.
Yeah, do that. I might go out for groceries around noon, so a heads-up would help.
Noted. I'll ping you once the plumber confirms an ETA.
So is the weather better there? It's drizzling all morning here. The kids had their raincoats on.
Sunny but cold. They said it might drop to 50°F by evening. I only packed one sweater.
Oops. Layer up if you can. You don't want to get sick. Remember last time you traveled and caught that bug?
Oh, that was awful. I'll be careful, promise.
By the way, have you heard about the new flight deals I saw online? Might be good for next month's getaway.
I can look them up if you want. I've seen some discounted tickets to a few coastal spots. 🏝️
Let's hold off for now. We'll check out those deals together tonight or tomorrow.
Understood. Will wait until you decide the timing.
So, how are the kids adjusting to the new school schedule? They seemed a bit cranky last week.
They're getting used to it. The early mornings are tough, but they're fine once they're out the door.
That's good to hear. I'll try to help with drop-offs once I'm back.
Appreciated. By the way, did you pay the phone bill before you left?
Yep, all sorted. You shouldn't get any random disconnections. 😅
Cool. One less thing for me to worry about.
I can set up recurring reminders if you'd prefer not to track bills manually each time.
That might be helpful. Just put them a week before each due date.
Setting up recurring bill reminders, one week prior to each due date...
Anyway, I should head down for the conference breakfast soon. My session starts in an hour.
Grab something healthy. Remember, you tend to skip meals when you're stressed.
I will. Fruit salad and maybe some coffee. Gotta stay alert!
I'll quickly remind you: your presentation is at 2 PM, and there's a networking event at 4 PM. 🗓️
Great. That means I'll be done by 5 or so, then we can do that video call at 7.
Yes, 7 it is. We'll be waiting. Probably the kids will want to show you their new drawings.
Aww, I love their artwork. Save a spot on the fridge. 😄
No problem. By the way, got an update from the plumber—he's on track for 2:30 arrival.
Cool. I'll run my errands early so I can be home by 2.
Alright, I'm signing off now. Need to mentally prep for this talk. Wish me luck!
Good luck. You'll do fine. Just breathe and be confident.
Yes, you got this! And don't forget your slides. 😉
Haha, thanks. Catch you both later.
I'll be around. Let me know how it goes. Bye!
Bye. I'll ping you with any updates on the house or the plumber if needed.
